alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:04AM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with the highest amounts on benches. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
